title: android.speech.SpeechRecognizer stopped working after December 2020 security update
content: Since the December 2020 security update, user of my app with Pixel devices say the speech recognition feature fail with SpeechRecognizer.ERROR_CLIENT. It worked prior, and still works on my non-Pixel device with the same Google app version 11.41.10.23.arm64. Please advice on how to fix, or workaround the issue.
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3 XL
